<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/go/03_medium/source.go">
package server

import (
    "fmt"
)

type Config struct
    Port int
    Host string

func (c *Config) Validate() error

type ConfigError struct
    Field string
    Reason string

func (e *ConfigError) Error() string

type Server struct
    Config
    listener string

func (s *Server) Start() error
</file>
